short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab page into a calming scene with this serene raccoon resting on a tree branch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the standard new tab background with a soothing image of a gentle raccoon resting peacefully on a tree branch. The soft fur, calm expression, and natural surroundings offer a perfect retreat into nature. Each time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by this tranquil scene, making your online experience more serene and refreshing. Ideal for nature lovers, animal enthusiasts, or anyone looking to inject a moment of calm into their digital routine. With this extension, take a brief pause from your busy schedule and enjoy the peaceful charm of the raccoonâ€™s gentle presence.

Please note that this extension may include affiliate links.
